p: The NMR spectra were performed in a Varian spectrometer (Walnut Creek, CA, USA, 400 MHz for 1H and 100 MHz for 13C) in CDCl 3 (from Sigma Aldrich, Saint Louis, MO, USA). The chemical shifts were reported in Î´ (ppm), relative to the signal of tetramethylsilane (TMS) and the coupling constants ( J) in Hz.
